channel.title: Off shore web hosting\VPS
channel.description:
Well I decided to post this cause I know alot of people search for VPS's at low prices... this is the lowest I have found and the best Off shore webhosting I have found.. And moparscape deals with RSPS sooooo yea sorry to a mod if this is wrong section.
[code]WebHosting Prices Free Hosting /1 Month $0.00 Package 1 /1 Month $1.99 Package 2 /1 Month $3.99[/code]
[code]VPS Prices (Linux only at the time) 256mb RAM and 10gb HDD $7.99/M 512mb RAM and 20gb HDD $12.99/M Addons Available 100mbps Data Connection [/code]
[code]Best Hosting Plan Hosting Space* UNLIMITED Monthly Bandwidth* Free Sitebuilder Host additional Domains UNLIMITED POP and IMAP Email UNLIMITED Email Forwarders UNLIMITED Email Autoresponder UNLIMITED Parked Domains UNLIMITED Subdomains UNLIMITED mySQL Databases UNLIMITED CGI-BIN SSI (Server Side Includes) Frontpage Extensions Cpanel Control Panel Webmail (Browser Based Email) Log Files + Site Stats Customizable Error Pages Web File Manager Spam Protection [/code]
The hosting is new but Dedicated server's and better VPS's will be coming soon.
MSN- Shadows-pking@hotmail.com
Something about, off shore webhosting and why its good: Nulled scripts are allowed! Having nulled scripts means FREE VBULLETIN!
